issue.title: nypost.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://nypost.com/2024/10/22/us-news/trump-says-car-loan-interest-deduction-will-only-apply-to-us-made-vehicles/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnypost.com%2F2024%2F10%2F22%2Fus-news%2Ftrump-says-car-loan-interest-deduction-will-only-apply-to-us-made-vehicles%2F) ### Comment > Video gets pinned to top of screen when scrolling through any NY Post article. Username: `@Rodaimi` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kpwtiyls81swos40ogssocss08k8ss4n6suetkt4cg.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base,

AdGuard Widgets,

comment.body:
The following rule works but only for one page.

nypost.com###jw-player-SPdDOYds-W5xXwQyA > div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset.jw-float-to-top:nth-child(2)

https://nypost.com/2024/11/17/us-news/nyc-da-alvin-bragg-favored-to-win-re-election-new-yorkers-are-crazy/

I think a rule blocking only div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset.jw-float-to-top will work on all pages.
